channel.title: bash on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in bash on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Bash function: recent
item.description: #!/bin/env bash # Display recently changed files recursively below the current directory # recent [minutes] # minutes: The number of minutes to display.

item.title: Docker Kitematic (Beta) and iTerm2 3.0 Beta
item.description: I guess using everything in beta can cause issues, but whatever. Kitematic has an ‘Exec’ option for containers which opens a terminal connected to that container.
